option1.name: includeChildProjects
option1.label: Include child project data? (True/False)
option1.description: Should the report include data from child projects? (True/False)

option2.name: cvssVersion
option2.label: CVSS Version (2.0/3.x)
option2.description: What version of CVSS scoring to report on? (2.0/3.x)

option3.name: includeAssociatedFiles
option3.label: Include associated files in report (True/False)
option3.description: Should the report include the associated files for the inventory item linked to the vulnerability? (True/False)
